item.title: Mentoring and Teaching
item.description:
I am currently looking for highly-motivated individuals to join my research group. We have several positions available, including research assistants, teaching assistants, interns, visiting students, and postdocs. If you are interested in joining our team, please take a moment to complete the application form to ensure that your application is properly processed. Additionally, kindly send an email to chen.recruiting@gmail.com with your CV and transcripts. We look forward to hearing from you and potentially welcoming you to our team!

  • Jiayu Li (Ph.D. 2023-)

  • Yujia Wu (M.S. in Data Science, 2023-)

  • Albert Kong (M.S. in Data Science, 2024-)
